mapper.select: select m.* from sys_user_role as ur left join sys_role as r on ur.role_id = r.role_id left join sys_role_menu as rm on r.role_id = rm.role_id left join sys_menu as m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id =#{userId} order by m.order_num asc
select m.* from sys_role_menu as rm ,sys_menu as m where rm.menu_id = m.menu_id and rm.role_id =#{roleId} order by m.order_num asc

select m.* from stu_role as ur left join sys_role as r on ur.role_id = r.role_id left join sys_role_menu as rm on r.role_id = rm.role_id left join sys_menu as m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.stu_id =#{stuId} order by m.order_num asc
